[Audio Unit Types](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584142-audio_unit_types)The defined types of audio processing plug-ins known as audio units.[Inter-App Audio Unit Types](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619501-inter-app-audio-unit-types)[Audio Unit Manufacturer Identifier](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584143-audio_unit_manufacturer_identifi)The Apple audio unit manufacturer code.[Audio Unit Output Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584148-audio-unit-output-subtypes)[I/O Audio Unit Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619485-i-o-audio-unit-subtypes)[Converter Audio Unit Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584145-converter_audio_unit_subtypes)Audio data format converter audio unit subtypes for audio units provided by Apple.[Reserved Audio Unit Clump Identifier](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1533986-reserved_audio_unit_clump_identi)Reserved for system use.[Offline Audio Unit Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1534054-offline_audio_unit_properties)Properties for audio units that perform offline processingâ€”that is, processing in a nonplayback, nonrealtime mode.[MIDI Audio Unit Parameters](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1389613-midi_audio_unit_parameters)Parameters for instrument units.[General Audio Unit Function Selectors](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584140-general_audio_unit_function_sele)General audio unit component selectors that correspond to functions in the audio unit API.[Generator Audio Unit Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619493-generator_audio_unit_subtypes)Audio units that serve as sound sources.[Input/Output Audio Unit Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584139-input_output_audio_unit_subtypes)Input/output audio unit subtypes for audio units provided by Apple.[Audio Unit Panner Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584151-audio-unit-panner-subtypes)[Audio Unit Player Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584155-audio-unit-player-subtypes)[Audio Unit Pitch Subtypes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1584152-audio-unit-pitch-subtypes)
